decision_conditions: The submitted details relating to noise impact assessment and mitigation measures, in pursuant to condition 4 of planning permission 234185HH dated 12/12/2023, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policy 1.1 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and Policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of a noise assessment in pursuant to condition 4 of planning permission ref: 234185HH dated 12/12/2023 for' installation of four AC units, 2 on first floor side elevation and 2 on ground floor rear elevation (Part retrospective application)'
